statements: SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, action, log_id FROM audit_logs;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE action LIKE '%delete%' AND user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS action_count FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING action_count > 5 ORDER BY action_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT id, audit_date, user_id, action_type, details FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, audit_date, action_type, details FROM audit_logs ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, action_type FROM audit_logs WHERE action_type = 'LOGIN';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT audit_date, action_type, details FROM audit_logs WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM audit_logs;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT id, user_id, action FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT description FROM events WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activities_count FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING activities_count > 5 ORDER BY activities_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action FROM user_actions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM audit_log_details WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT action_id, user_id, action FROM user_actions LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM user_actions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT a.log_id, a.user_id, b.username, a.action, a.timestamp FROM audit_logs a JOIN user_accounts b ON a.user_id = b.user_id;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT policy_name, description FROM policies ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT audit_type, details FROM compliance_audit WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY audit_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 10 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';

SELECT p.policy_name, pl.timestamp, ua.full_name FROM policies p JOIN policy_log pl ON p.policy_id = pl.policy_id JOIN user_accounts ua ON pl.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE p.description LIKE '%security%';
